name: Restore Mother Nature
description:
Robots have corrupted Mother Nature! Zachary must collect seeds to restore Mother Nature and defeat the robots!

Controls:
A and D to move left and right.
Space Bar to jump.
Aim with mouse cursor.
Left click to fire bullet.

Credits:
Artists: IzzyArcher, DDMANNN
Programming: ShawnTheSheep
Level Designer: JimmyNoBob

This game was made during the 2022 Global Game Jam.
